name: Mirrored Bella
description:
In Mirrored Bella, a strange cosmic mirror separates the world in two, exposing everyone's dark self. While her castle is being attacked, Bella is looking for answers.

Mirrored Bella has been created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. What you're about to play is the result of just 48 hours of hard work. Hope you enjoy it!
